title: Deadlock
description:
This is my biggest project right now.
Deadlock will be the first OpenSource coding & hacking game platform.
Our goal? Simply reinvent the way people learn computer-science, and the way we get our new recruits.
The project is a year-long project and should be Opensourced before the end of year 2017.
Want to take part in the project? Message me!

Tech Stack: Java 8, Spring Boot, JavaFX, Docker, Ansible, React.js, Redux

title: Student Trainings
description:
How to get better at programming Java applications.
This training material was carefully setup to enable university-level students to transcend their level in Java, Performance Tuning, Continuous Delivery, TDD, and Front end development.
Many projects have been released:
Code Review Scheduler (2 weeks)
MOTM (2 weeks)
Computer-database (2 months)

title: Training Material & Samples
description:

title: Contributions
description: Contributing to a few open source projects: Android Libraries, Gulp libraries, NodeMCU library, Spotify Java API for Docker, Dashboard TV, and many more.
